Load Rosters

Source: R/load_nflverse.R
load_rosters.Rd

Load Rosters

load_rosters(seasons = most_recent_season(roster = TRUE))

Arguments

seasons

a numeric vector of seasons to return, defaults to returning this year's data if it is March or later. If set to TRUE, will return all available data.

Value

A tibble of season-level roster data.

See also

dictionary_rosters for the data dictionary as a dataframe

https://github.com/nflverse/nflfastR-roster

https://www.nflfastr.com/reference/fast_scraper_roster.html

Examples

# \donttest{
  load_rosters(2020)
#> # A tibble: 4,624 × 25
#>    season team  position depth_chart_position jersey_number status full_name

#>  7   2020 ARI   CB       RCB                             25 Active Johnathan Jo…
#>  8   2020 ARI   CB       LCB                             23 Active Robert Alford
#>  9   2020 ARI   CB       LCB                             21 Active Patrick Pete…
#> 10   2020 ARI   CB       RCB                             20 Active Dre Kirkpatr…
